categoryBlurb: Sisters. Grandmas. Moms. Aunts. Cousins. Friends. Colleagues. They are special to you - and you want to get them a gift that is equally special. butter LONDON® believes in Rock & Roll. Great Britain. And they are obsessed with colour, unbridled creativity & self-expression.  They never add Formaldehyde, Toluene, DBP, phthalates or parabens to any of their products. Sophisticated enough for the most posh dressing table, butter LONDON is the go-to gift for the fashionista.
categoryMetaDescription: Sophisticated enough for the most posh dressing table, butter LONDON is the go-to gift for the fashionista. Great gifts. Great quality (NO Formaldehyde, Toluene, DBP, ...)

productList.productName: butter LONDON™ Gears & Gadgets Ultimate Lacquer Trunk
productList.productDescription: Oprah's 2014 Beauty Gift Guide Pick! All hail the ultimate gift for the beauty obsessed!  Discover your signature look with 20 gorgeous Fashion Size Shades, 4 best-selling treatments and our favourite tools of the trade.  This is a great group gift for a woman, whether she’s single, a mother, young or older. Take the group gift to another level by inviting friends over for a manicure and wine party while watching a great flick together.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter butter LONDON Gears Gadgets Ultimate Lacquer Trunk

productList.productDescription:
A great gift for the colour obsessed! If you're anything like us, choosing a lacquer colour is the hardest decision of the day. So we've created the ultimate collection featuring 40 of our top-selling shades and textures. Create endless new looks and flaunt your fabulous.


SET INCLUDES all of the following:


butter LONDON tiered storage unit - 11" x 12" x 1", Chancer, Come to Bed Red, Snog, Trout Pout, Jaffa, Tea with the Queen, Yummy Mummy, Hen Party, Cotton Buds, Fairy Cake, Tramp Stamp, Shag, Wallis, Marbs, The 444, Bobby Dazzler, Cheeky Chops, Wellies, Jaded Jack, British Racing Green, Poole, Fiver, Slapper, Jack the Lad, Knackered, Royal Navy, Scallywag, Sprog, Blagger, Keks, Scouse, HRH, Indigo Punk, Queen Vic, Lovely Jubbly, Scoundrel, La Moss, The Black Knight, Union Jack Black, and Billy No Mates


Link to butter LONDON’s site: http://www.butterlondon.com/Collections/GiftStarter/London-Calling-40-Piece-Set.html
productList.productMetaDescription: A great gift for the colour obsessed who loves great nail products. This set features 40 of butter LONDON’s top-selling shades and textures. Gift of colors.

productList.productName: Art of Alchemy Gift Set ($100 Value)
productList.productDescription:
Channel your inner alchemist and transform your lacquer with layering shades that add depth and dimension. Experiment with professional-grade tools, and high-fashion colour to create your signature look.


SET INCLUDES all of the following with full size colours:


Cotton Buds (Opaque, pure white creme), Brown Sugar (Full Coverage, copper shimmer with gold glitter), Pillar Box Red (Opaque, red-orange creme), Chocka - Set Exclusive! (


Opaque, deep plum shimmer), Goss (Opaque, rosy shimmer), Full Steam Ahead - Set Exclusive! (Opaque, grey creme), Dotting Tool, and a Cleanup Brush.


Link to butter LONDON’s site: http://www.butterlondon.com/Collections/GiftStarter/Art-of-Alchemy.html
productList.productMetaDescription: Great group gift for the nail art obsessed who loves great nail products. This set features colors, layering shades and tools to create a signature look with butter LONDON.

productList.productDescription:
A wonderful group gift to give together for the Bezzie Mate who has everything (except a place to keep all her lacquers). This limited edition "stair step" station holds up to 40 lacquers or treatments. Lacquers in photo not included.  ($175 - Station only)



Link to butter LONDON’s site: http://www.butterlondon.com/Collections/GiftStarter/butter-LONDON-Stairstep-Station.html
productList.productMetaDescription: Great group gift for the nail art obsessed with great nail products. Limited edition butter LONDON “stair step” station holds up to 40 lacquers, nail polish or treatments.

productList.productName: butter LONDON “Let Them Wear Red” - GiftStarter Exclusive Set ($160 Value)
productList.productNameShort: Let Them Wear Red Gift Set
productList.productDescription:
This is a GiftStarter exclusive set from butter LONDON worth $160. All your favorite products with shades of red for every occasion.


This exclusive set includes all of the RED items from butter LONDON’s collection:



  • Ladybird Liquid Lipstick - This opaque, tomato red liquid lipstick is ruling the catwalk! Grab our exclusive Fashion Week shade and rock it in red.

  • Come to Bed Red Moisture Matte Lipstick - Full coverage, classic red cream

  • Secret Door Lip Gloss - Sheer, poppy red gloss.

  • Saucy Jack Nail Lacquer - A dark, blood red creme. In the immortal words of Derek Smalls, “You're a naughty one, Saucy Jack!“

  • Chancer Nail Lacquer - Wear this deep, “crushed glitter“ red nail lacquer when you are feeling particularly out of his league. He doesn't deserve you anyway.

  • Old Blighty Nail Lacquer - A solid, brick red nail lacquer that lies between red and brown. Sexy, yet sensible; just like you.

  • La Moss Nail Lacquer - A vampy deep, dark red nail lacquer full of red wine, just like its inspiration.

  • Nail 999 Rescue System - Named for the British equivalent of “911“ in the States, the Nail 999™ Rescue System instantly brightens the appearance of your nails.
productList.productMetaDescription: Great group gift for a person obsessed with great nail products or loves the color red. Exclusive gift set featuring all of the color RED gifts from butter LONDON.
productList.imageAltText: Let Them Wear Red Gift Set

productList.productDescription:

productList.productDescription:
Scrubbers, butter LONDON's 2-in-1 wipes, are designed to strip away yesterday’s mani and prep your nails for your next bespoke nail creation. All with one little wipe.


12 Boxes of Scrubbers, for the price of 10.
productList.productMetaDescription: Scrubbers, butter LONDON's 2-in-1 wipes, are designed to strip away yesterday’s mani and prep your nails for your next bespoke nail creation. All with one little wipe.

productList.productDescription:
Two sets and save $5!  


 


Patent-Gel Top & Tails Set


Patent-Gel Top & Tails is a revolutionary duo that puts patent-leather shine at your fingertips, without harsh chemicals or UV lamps. The healthy alternative to gel manicures!


Nail 999 Rescue System


Named for the British equivalent of "911" in the States, the Nail 999™ Rescue System instantly brightens the appearance of your nails. Formulated with fortifying vitamins, proteins and Horsetail Extract to promote nail strength and growth, this system offers instant relief to dry brittle nails and rejuvenates nails damaged by UV-gel manicures.
productList.productMetaDescription: Great gift for the fashionista who loves to be bold with their finger tips.  Two gorgeous and very useful nail gift sets.  Gift it together to make it meaningful.
